column1: GOAALLLL! GAME OVER! 2-0 IRAN! One goal behind
column2: Wales get caught on the counter. Taremi moves forward with the ball
column3: waiting for support. Rezaeian rushes up from right-back to the outskirts of the box
column4: chipping it over Ward and into the goal.

column1: 90+8'	GOAAALLLLLLL! WHAT A STRIKE FROM CHESHMI! 1-0 IRAN! That may be the winner! From outside the box
column2: Cheshmi lashes the ball into the bottom corner
column3: after Allen's poked clearance rolled to his feet.
